course_title: Alexander the Great and his Empire

001.comments: If the course is full or blocked, please register in the waitlist section.

WL1.comments: Waitlist for CLST 356-001. Students will be manually moved in order of registration from the waitlist to the course section as seats become available. If the course is blocked but showing available seats, waitlist transfers have not yet taken place.

description: The rise of Macedon under Philip II leading to its domination of Greece and the overthrow of the Persian Empire by his son, Alexander; the subsequent spread of Greek civilization in the East.
